name: Bane of Catboys
description:
catboys are known and loved for their kawaii kyun-kyun cuddly character, but what if it was revealed to be just a ruse to rouse your rapport? 

catboys are taking over the mall! kiki, sadbot, and ani from the new vtuber group MECHANICA.AI take it upon themselves to save the world from the oncoming threat!

CONTROLS:
movement - wasd or numpad
select - z, enter, space
cancel/menu - x, esc, num pad 0

https://twitter.com/mechanica_ai
